text: Mariusz Krzywda (born 8 February 1974) is a retired Polish football midfielder.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Igloopol Dębica players Category:Hutnik Nowa Huta players Category:Jagiellonia Białystok players Category:Sandecja Nowy Sącz players Category:Mławianka Mława players Category:MG MZKS Kozienice players Category:Association football midfielders
